programme.title: Blood of the Vine
programme.sub-title: Blood of the Vine: Late Vengeance in Alsace (Sn 3 Ep 3)
programme.desc: Benjamin Lebel is a renowned wine expert and a part-time sleuth whose intuition and nose are stimulated by puzzling murders. A journalist is killed in Alsace while investigating an old client of Benjamin's. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Nero Wolfe
programme.sub-title: Nero Wolfe: Champagne for One (Sn 1 Ep 2)
programme.desc: Curmudgeonly aesthete Nero Wolfe is one of Rome's finest investigators. Based on the classic novels by Rex Stout. Archie witnesses a murder during a charity benefit for single mothers. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Blood of the Vine
programme.sub-title: Blood of the Vine: Margaux's Robe (Sn 1 Ep .3)
programme.desc: Benjamin Lebel is a renowned wine expert and a part-time sleuth whose intuition and nose are stimulated by puzzling murders. Benjamin's daughter and her boyfriend get into a terrible car accident. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Magellan
programme.desc: Inspector and family man Simon Magellan unravels crimes and mysteries in the fictional French town of Saignac. A slain charity club president and corporate lawyer had no shortage of enemies. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. The Marshal is accused of corruption as he works undercover to nab some local drug traffickers. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.sub-title: Don Matteo: The Wrong Road (Sn 7 Ep 17)
programme.desc: Everybody thinks the Marshal saved a girls life by heroically throwing himself into a fire, but the hero was actually someone else.

programme.desc: Louise and her team are determined to unmask the killer of a student at a top chemistry school.

programme.title: The Jump
programme.desc: In 1970, a Lithuanian sailor and would-be defector jumped off his Soviet vessel aboard a US Coast Guard Cutter, asking for asylum. His leap led to one of the biggest political muddles of the Cold War.
